dialogue.name: merchandise1
dialogue.message: Hello! ...|Do you want to see the store or just talk?

dialogue.name: rockgolem1
dialogue.message: Would you like me to tell you about the Rock Golems living in the area?

dialogue.name: rockgolem1_1
dialogue.message: They are imposing giants from the first era of our world, spawned by the remnants of primordial magic and Mother Earth ...
I've heard it said that if you planted an Eliegor seed on his head, then this giant would bind himself forever to his donor!
But of course that's ancient history ... well if you're temperate enough maybe you'd be interested in this seed ...
This seed comes from an intensely purplish-red flower, usually found at the top of certain mountains.
Do you want to go on a quest for the Golem D'Eliegor?

dialogue.name: rockgolem1_2
dialogue.message: Well, you'll have to be very careful and have a green thumb! Equip yourself well before you leave...
Would you like to see some items in my store?
